review: the fire stick was a big let down because it would not allow me to watch netflix movies and it does not assk for Netflix account no type of instructions is the biggest flaw
author: art huntley

review: This product does not compare at all to Apple TV. While Im a prime member, I find that every movie I want to watch requires a rental fee. The platform for searching is not nearly as user friendly as Apple TV. The music does have a kareokee feature which is cool. All the words on the screen. My wife loves that. The movies we have watched doen't seem to show in high resolution on my plasma tv which i find frustrating.
author: Randell S. Southland

review: I LOVE my Firestick!  It was everything I had hoped for. It exceeded expectations. Very easy and simple setup. I'll be buying more as gifts!
author: Nona

review: what a disappointment....I love amazon but this stick does not work...blue screen, no picture...HDCP signal....I sent it back...hope Roku is better.Lee
